title: Authentic Meditation Education
description: We are a global network of Authentic Yoga & Meditation Education Providers. Our Mission is, to bring all Genuine Yoga & Meditation Centres, Institutes and Teachers together under one umbrella to enable people to connect with authentic Meditation Practices from across the world.
cleaned_text: Connect With More students and showcase your courses, venues and events. We are a global network of Authentic Meditation Education Providers that provides Certification to Genuine Teachers and Schools. We bring Authentic Meditation Centres, Institutes and Teachers from across traditions and continents together, under one umbrella to enable people to connect with authentic Meditation Practices from across the world. Search our website to instantly connect with Certified Teachers and Schools from across the world. For Local Meditation Education Providers, our Certification and network works as a powerful tool to state their Authenticity and for connecting with more students.
